item.title: Boot Hill
item.description: Boot Hill is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film starring Terence Hill and Bud Spencer. This film is the last one in a trilogy that started with God Forgives... I Don't! (1967), followed by Ace High (1968).

item.title: John the Bastard
item.description: John the Bastard is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Armando Crispino and starring John Richardson.

item.title: W Django!
item.description: W Django! is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Edoardo Mulargia and starring Anthony Steffen.
